list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add .idea/workspace.xml to track IDE-specific settings
This commit adds the PyCharm-specific workspace configuration file. It includes project-level settings such as change lists, Git integration, Python interpreter configuration, and other IDE preferences. These settings help to standardize the development environment for collaborators using PyCharm.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions
